Description:
Required skills to be successfulTechnology domain understanding in one of the ITIL processes such as Incident, request or change management.
Analysis and troubleshooting skills used to support end users.
Capability to design process modules & identify service risks What equips you for the roleCollege or University degree in Computer Science and Engineering or a related discipline
1 year of experience in IT Service Management & ITSM “Ticketing” tool would be an advantage. Job Details
